snippet: Ann Mara, the mother of the Giants’ president and C.E.O. John Mara, rarely misses a game. Sunday’s Super Bowl is no exception even though she has a broken right shoulder.
abstract: Dave Anderson Sports of The Times column on Ann Mara, mother of the New York Giants president and CEO John Mara; the matriarch rarely misses a game and will be at Super Bowl despite her broken right shoulder.
lead_paragraph: Ann Mara, the mother of the Giants’ president and C.E.O. John Mara, rarely misses a game. Sunday’s Super Bowl is no exception even though she has a broken right shoulder.

headline.seo: Super Bowl — Ann Mara, a Giants Matriarch on the Injured List
headline.main: A Matriarch on the Injured List Adds to Her Giants Highlights
headline.print_headline: A Matriarch on the Injured List Adds to Her Giants Highlights
